title: [Butterfly Garden]
description: Brilliantly colored nectar flowers nod slowly in the shifting air currents, raising their heads toward the sunlight.  Woody shrubs interspersed with flowering lilies and azaleas form a loose ring around the garden.  A shallow oval pond at the edge of the garden keeps the air moist and features a wide, sandy border, perfect for the puddling of butterflies.

Brilliantly colored nectar flowers nod slowly in the shifting air currents, their colors dimmed by the silver moonlight.  Woody shrubs interspersed with flowering lilies and azaleas form a loose ring around the garden.  A shallow oval pond at the edge of the garden keeps the air moist and features a wide, sandy border, perfect for the puddling of butterflies.
